document_name: MDG-F BiH YEM JPD Final Revisions 19 Dec.doc
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BIH/00050771/MDG-F BiH YEM JPD Final Revisions 19 Dec.doc

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Youth Information, Counseling and Training Centers (CISO) established, equipped, staffed and operational  
8 500 young people, male and female provided with job counselling assistance, trainings and access to up to date labour market information
Civil society and private sector engaged in development of Youth Work Experience Policy for introduction and formalization of youth work experience schemes
Work experience provided to at least 550 youth, male and female, through different work experience schemes
Young unemployed women and women from vulnerable categories in particular received direct, one-on-one job counselling assistance (individual employment plans), training to improve employability, and direct, one-on-one job-search assistance

project_descr: The Youth Employability and Retention Programme aims to address the high youth unemployment and irregular migration by working closely with Government, the private sector and civil society to improve the employability of BiH youth.
project_title: Youth employability and retention in BIH
